sentences.sentence: Different upbringings set children on different paths and can deepen socioeconomic divisions, especially because education is strongly linked to earnings.
sentences.translation: 不同的教养方式会让孩子走上不同的道路，并可能加深社会经济分化，尤其是因为教育与收入密切相关。

sentences.sentence: Otherwise you will sorry parents upbringings.
sentences.translation: 否则你就对不起父母的养育之恩。

sentences.sentence: Miley also became close to her co-star Kelly Osbourne during filming, due to their similar upbringings.
sentences.translation: 麦莉也成为接近她合演凯利·奥斯本在拍摄过程中，由于其类似的成长过程。
